1101000001001001 1100100010000001 1 -> sum: 1001100011001011, cout: 1
0101111101110001 0110110111000100 1 -> sum: 1100110100110110, cout: 0
1111000110001010 1011011011101110 1 -> sum: 1010100001111001, cout: 1
0100001010100000 1000010010101011 1 -> sum: 1100011101001100, cout: 0
0100010101011011 1110111111100001 0 -> sum: 0011010100111100, cout: 1
0110001000000100 0111010000000100 1 -> sum: 1101011000001001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
